data.subject: somethings you would have never guessed
data.message:
Ok so its a lot easier to write on here. even if no one reads it then it is to explain to everyone...I have been struggling with an eating disorder since i was 15. yes i still struggle with it. I was diagnosed with it when i was 18 before I got pregnant. so when you say i look to skinny thats only motivation and thats not something i want and this is not something i'm proud of by any means. its a disease, nothing people do by choice.

the other thing is i used to self harm.. USED TO is the key word. I'm sure yall have seen the scars. this is a packaged deal with anorexia usually and its not fun. So yes, that is why i got "God" tattooed on my wrist, because he saved me from my wrong doings.well thats it. i'm not screaming out for attention cause thats the last thing i want. its just soo much easier to tell everyone since only a few know. ok
hope you don't mind me commenting on this..I found this very touching
